comment.shortText:
There is a [[BaseWidget]] which you can inherit from if your Widget
triggers the common events [[CHANGE]], [[DATABINDING]], [[DATABOUND]].
comment.text: If your Widget is not using those events, inherit directly from Any Widget should inherit from kendo.ui.Widget.

comment.shortText: Package with all the classes for the GaugeWidget.

tags.text: This enum holds strings for the position of a [[GaugeWidget]] legend

comment.shortText:
Widget that shows a circular chart comparing 2 numeric values (implied to be times)
as a percentage value.
Returns the percentage value that is calculated from innerValue / outerValue
refresh is called by the Datasource when it changes or from external code.
Set and get the value
Set and get the value
Set and get the value
comment.returns: the value object of this widget

comment.shortText: Viewmodel for a [[GaugeWidget]]
the value for the inner slice of the [[GaugeWidget]]
the value for the outer slice of the [[GaugeWidget]]
Options for a [[GaugeWidget]]

describes the gap of the Gauge as a fraction of the circle.
0 will have no gap, the larger slice will be a full circle. 0.5 will be a half circle.
position of the legend. values can be top, right, bottom, left
offset between the slices
thickness of the slices
a value consisting of a name and a numeric value
BaseWidget which has static strings for common events

comment.shortText: Utility class with static members

secondsToTimeString
Returns for a given number that represents seconds a string in the form of [[0h] 0m] 0s
